visualization_prompt: Generate a solid gauge chart showing value overflow beyond axis limits using gradient color encoding

title.text: Solidgauge data overflow past full circle (#2997)

visualization_explanation: This solid gauge visualization demonstrates value overflow through careful axis calibration and gradient encoding. The dataset contains a single quantitative variable (pressure differential) exceeding the [-5,5] kPa scale. Synthetic data follows extreme value distribution principles (μ=5, σ=10) to test visualization boundaries. The red-to-green gradient leverages Cairo's preattentive processing for immediate value assessment. Tufte's data-ink ratio is maximized through axis simplification (no gridlines) and direct numeric labeling. The arc background shape (innerRadius=60%) creates visual containment while maintaining proportional ink for the overflow state. Date.UTC formatting isn't required as this represents instantaneous measurement values. Formatting follows D3-style precision (.2f kPa) for technical clarity.
